Clipped from: [https://www.marxists.org/archive/mariateg/works/index.htm](https://www.marxists.org/archive/mariateg/works/index.htm)

"Certainly, we do not wish that Socialism in America be a tracing and a copy.  It must be a heroic creation.  
We must, with our own reality, in our own language, bring Indoamerican socialism to life."  
 - in 'Aniversario y balance', Amauta no. 26 (17 Sept., 1928)
